item.title: Box Office: ‘Superman’ Saves the Day for DC Studios With $122M Domestic Opening, $217M Globally
item.description: Directed by James Gunn, the superhero pic appears to be succeeding in rebooting both the Warner Bros.-owned DC and its most prized comic book film franchise.

item.title: ‘Superman’ Star Nicholas Hoult Takes on New Role as Save the Children Ambassador
